songs.title: Outro (The World is Yours)
songs.lyrics:
*gunshots and dropped bomb*

[Newscaster]
Police say he’s unpredictable…
Mood swings ranging from a soft side…
Police say he’s unpredictable…
Friends say he always has a gun with him or nearby…
Police say he’s unpredictable…
Mood swings ranging from a soft side…
Police say he’s unpredictable…
Friends say he always has a gun with him or nearby…
